name: Your Love as a Gift
description:
Concept game that you can configure to make it unique. 

The idea behind this game is to send a message to someone by completing a simple game, like sending a love proposal for valentine's day!

If you go to "Settings", you will be able to configure:

  • Game's Title
  • You Win Message (this is the message to be shown to who will be playing this game)

Then, from the main menu, if you press the "Engine" Icon, at the bottom right, you will be able to configure:

  • Life Amount (Player's life points)
  • Points to Win (how many "love" points player needs to "Win" the game, and see your message).
  • Music and Sfxs volume levels.

After configuring the game, you can share it to the one you want to receive your message (check what happens if he/she accepts/rejects your message)

Game made by Raúl Ibarra Aranda.

Music and sound effects made by www.soundxp.net.
